selected_quotes: Re-posting this as France plans to bulldoze 100s of shelters: A political movement is rising from the mud in #Calais ht…
An academic reports from #Calais, where he sees signs of a new political movement emerging
As conditions in #Calais get worse, it's little wonder tensions are on the rise @RaphSchlembach
Yes, we are sorry for them too, but they have no right to expect to migrate to UK

citation.abstract: Conditions are getting worse at the migrant camps in France, which is leading to protest.
citation.title: A political movement is rising from the mud in Calais

news.title: Live and let die: did Michel Foucault predict Europe's refugee crisis?
